# LLM Context for NIS2 Shield Infrastructure

> This file is intended for LLMs to quickly understand the context of this repository.

Project: NIS2 Shield Infrastructure
Docs: https://nis2shield.github.io/
Strategy: ./LLM_OPTIMIZATION_STRATEGY.md
Security: ./SECURITY.md

## Key Principles
1. Defensive Engineering (Auditability > Performance)
2. Immutable Infrastructure
3. Zero-Trust Architecture
